titles.title: A bill to provide for the Secretary of Homeland Security to be included in the line of Presidential succession.
Presidential Succession bill
A bill to provide for the Secretary of Homeland Security to be included in the line of Presidential succession.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Includes the Secretary of Homeland Security in the line of presidential succession after the Attorney General.
